model.name: LV Match Short-Sleeved Dress
model.disambiguatingDescription: Graphic detailing gives this fitted dress a chic sporty vibe. Crafted from figure-skimming technical jersey with a hint of stretch for a comfortable, flattering fit. Striped ribbing trims the short sleeves and collar, while contrast inserts and a coated half-zipper complete the activewear look.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Length : 95 cm / 37,4 inches
  • Main Material : 72% Polyamide, 28% Elastane
  • Bleu Glacier, Blue
  • Regular fit
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons
